The Reverse Sensing System audibly alerts you to obstacles when you’re slowly backing up. The closer you get to an obstacle, the more repetitive the alert becomes.

attributes.BP2_PartDetails_Exterior_Packages:
Available on XLT 301A/302A and LARIAT 501A.

Includes:
• 265/60R18 A/S BSW – 4x2
• 265/60R18 A/T BSW – 4x4
• 265/60R18 A/T OWL – with FX4 Off-Road Package
• 18" Black Painted Aluminum Wheel with Black Center Cap
• Bedliner – Tough Bed® Spray-in
• Black Ford Logo with Smoked Chrome Surround
• Black Grille with Black Surround – XLT only
• Black Grille with Black Surround and Black Bars – LARIAT only
• Black Mirror Skull Caps – LARIAT only
• Black Sill Plates
• Black Steel Exposed Bash Plate (with FX4 Off-Road Package)
• Body-Color Front & Rear Bumper with Black Lower Front Fascia
• Dark Box Decal (FX4 Package or 4x4 only)
• Running Boards – 5" Rectangular – Black

Not available with:
• XLT Chrome Appearance Package
• XLT Sport Appearance Package
• Lariat Chrome Appearance Package
• Lariat Sport Appearance Package
• Bed Utility Package
• Tremor Off-Road Package

Available on XL, XLT and LARIAT.

Towing Capability up to 7,500 lbs.

attributes.BP2_PartDetails_Audio_Upgrade:
The Ford Ranger combines exceptional toughness and all-terrain capability with lots of advanced technology with SYNC® 3*.

Includes: 
• Enhanced Voice Recognition Communications and Entertainment System
•  8” LCD Capacitive Touchscreen in Center Stack with Swipe Capability
• Pinch-to-zoom capability included with available Voice-Activated Touchscreen Navigation System
• Applink®
• 911 Assist®
• Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™ Compatibility**
• Smart Charging USB Port – two (2)


*SYNC® is an optional feature. Don't drive while distracted. Use voice-operated systems when possible; don't use handheld devices while driving. Some features may be locked out while the vehicle is in gear. Not all features are compatible with all phones. Message and data rates may apply. Optional Navigation System map updates cannot be received via Wi-fi® and require a separate update.

**Requires phone with active data service and compatible software. SYNC 3 does not control 3rd party products while in use. 3rd Parties are solely responsible for their respective functionality.

SiriusXM: What you love is on now

All SiriusXM-equipped new Model Year 2021 Ford vehicles with SYNC 3 come with a 3-month* All Access trial subscription so you get to try the widest variety of entertainment anywhere including the deepest variety of music, ad-free, more sports coverage than anywhere, exclusive talk channels, every kind of comedy and the most complete news coverage. You can also enjoy SiriusXM online, on the app and at home on connected devices — it’s included with your All Access trial subscription. 

*Trial length and service availability may vary by model, model year or trim.

attributes.BP2_Pages_VehicleName_Disclaimer: 2021 Ford Ranger XLT SuperCrew®, 5' Box, 4x4, 2.3L EcoBoost Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology, Electronic Ten-Speed Automatic Transmission, 3.73 Open Style Axle Ratio

attributes.BP2_PartDetails_Transmissions: The 10-speed SelectShift® automatic transmission, featuring Ford-patented technology, optimizes gear progressions and delivers smooth, quick shifting up and down the gearbox. Features include wide-span gear spacing coupled with drag-reduction actions plus three overdrive gears.
attributes.BP2_Pages_VehicleName_Disclaimer: 2021 Ford Ranger XLT SuperCrew®, 5' Box, 4x4, 2.3L EcoBoost Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology, Electronic Ten-Speed Automatic Transmission, 3.73 Open Style Axle Ratio
2021 Ford Ranger XLT SuperCrew®, 5' Box, 4x4, 2.3L EcoBoost Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology, Electronic Ten-Speed Automatic Transmission, 3.73 Open Style Axle Ratio
attributes.BP2_PartDetails_Drive: 4X4 is available on all Ranger models.

attributes.BP2_PartDescriptions_Engine: 2.3L EcoBoost Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology
attributes.BP2_PartDetails_Engine:
The 2.3L EcoBoost® is engineered with a precise direct injection system and 16 free-breathing valves. The twin-scroll turbocharger extracts exhaust gas from pairs of cylinders in alternating sequence, maximizing pulse energy to the turbine wheel for responsiveness on demand with virtually no lag. The 2.3L EcoBoost puts out 270 horsepower and a best-in-class gas-powered torque rating of 310 lb.-ft.*†

*Class is Midsize Pickups.

†Always consult the owner’s manual before off-road driving. Follow all laws and drive on designated off-road trails and recreation areas.
attributes.description: 2.3L EcoBoost Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology
attributes.BP2_Pages_VehicleName_Disclaimer: 2021 Ford Ranger XLT SuperCrew®, 5' Box, 4x4, 2.3L EcoBoost Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology, Electronic Ten-Speed Automatic Transmission, 3.73 Open Style Axle Ratio
